adrenaline_rush.name: Adrenaline Rush
adrenaline_rush.description: You can dash as a bonus action and gain temporary hit points, usable a limited number of times.

breath_weapon.name: Breath Weapon
breath_weapon.description: You can replace an attack with a blast of elemental energy that damages creatures in an area.

brave.name: Brave
brave.description: You have advantage on saving throws against being frightened.

celestial_revelation.name: Celestial Revelation
celestial_revelation.description: You can temporarily transform, gaining a supernatural effect such as flight, radiant aura, or a fear-inducing shroud.

celestial_resistance.name: Celestial Resistance
celestial_resistance.description: You have resistance to necrotic damage and radiant damage.

damage_resistance.name: Damage Resistance
damage_resistance.description: You have resistance to a specific type of damage determined by your ancestry.

darkvision.name: Darkvision
darkvision.description: You can see in darkness within a limited range as if it were dim light.

draconic_ancestry.name: Draconic Ancestry
draconic_ancestry.description: Your lineage is tied to a dragon, determining your associated damage type and other traits.

draconic_flight.name: Draconic Flight
draconic_flight.description: You can temporarily manifest spectral wings and gain a flying speed.

dwarven_resilience.name: Dwarven Resilience
dwarven_resilience.description: You have resistance to poison damage and advantage on saving throws against being poisoned.

dwarven_toughness.name: Dwarven Toughness
dwarven_toughness.description: Your hit point maximum increases, and it increases again each time you gain a level.

elven_lineage.name: Elven Lineage
elven_lineage.description: You gain magical abilities based on your elven lineage, including innate spells that improve with level.

fey_ancestry.name: Fey Ancestry
fey_ancestry.description: You have advantage on saving throws against being charmed.

fiendish_legacy.name: Fiendish Legacy
fiendish_legacy.description: You inherit infernal magic that grants damage resistance and innate spells that scale with level.

giant_ancestry.name: Giant Ancestry
giant_ancestry.description: You gain a powerful ability inherited from giant ancestry, usable a limited number of times.

gnomish_cunning.name: Gnomish Cunning
gnomish_cunning.description: You have advantage on Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma saving throws.

gnomish_lineage.name: Gnomish Lineage
gnomish_lineage.description: Your gnome heritage grants innate magical abilities based on your lineage choice.

halfling_nimbleness.name: Halfling Nimbleness
halfling_nimbleness.description: You can move through the space of creatures larger than you.

healing_hands.name: Healing Hands
healing_hands.description: You can magically heal a creature by touching it, restoring hit points once per long rest.

keen_senses.name: Keen Senses
keen_senses.description: You gain proficiency in one perceptive or survival-oriented skill.

large_form.name: Large Form
large_form.description: You can temporarily increase your size, gaining physical advantages for a short duration.

light_bearer.name: Light Bearer
light_bearer.description: You know the Light cantrip and can cast it innately.

luck.name: Luck
luck.description: When you roll a natural 1 on a d20 test, you can reroll the die.

naturally_stealthy.name: Naturally Stealthy
naturally_stealthy.description: You can attempt to hide even when only obscured by a larger creature.

otherworldly_presence.name: Otherworldly Presence
otherworldly_presence.description: You know the Thaumaturgy cantrip and cast it using your innate spellcasting ability.

powerful_build.name: Powerful Build
powerful_build.description: You count as a larger size for carrying capacity and have improved ability to escape grapples.

relentless_endurance.name: Relentless Endurance
relentless_endurance.description: When reduced to 0 hit points, you can instead drop to 1 hit point once per long rest.

resourceful.name: Resourceful
resourceful.description: You gain heroic inspiration whenever you finish a long rest.

skillful.name: Skillful
skillful.description: You gain proficiency in one skill of your choice.

stonecunning.name: Stonecunning
stonecunning.description: You can sense vibrations through stone surfaces, granting limited tremorsense.

trance.name: Trance
trance.description: You do not need to sleep and can complete a long rest in a shorter meditative state.

versatile.name: Versatile
versatile.description: You gain an origin feat of your choice.
